name: meaxrcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: sseldi(cfv(c0, c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxr))
-| wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cxr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxr))
-| wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cxr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmea))
-| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmea))
-| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

comment: The measure of a set is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
